intro.content: The idea for a fitness application popped up in my mind during the Covid-19 pandemic. The idea was to create a hassle free fitness app that lets you track you your fitness and health information without having to worry about data privacy issues.

spmList.name: Exercise recommendation based on the BMI count
Diet Recommendation based on various days of the week
Coded with Android Design Rules in mind
Connected to the Firebase & Google Fit API

description.content: The idea was started as a UI/UX Design concept project which took shape into a finished deployable android application.
